thread.section_title: ScreenCountry Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenCountry Inc | www.screencountry.com
thread.title: George Elkins
thread.title_full: ScreenCountry Inc reviewed by George Elkins

author: George Elkins
title: George Elkins
text: I was pleasantly surprised when the computer screen arrived after only three days. I personally had a computer tech install the screen for me, but it fit perfectly. I hope I will not need ScreenCountry service again any time soon, but I will definitely recommend it to others if the need arise.
